inclusion.criterion: Participants who are 18-65 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: MS patients who are ambulatory (Expanded Disability Status Scale score ≤ 5,5 ) in a stable phase of the disease, without relapses in the last 3 month.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has lower extremity weakness and urinary retention but is still ambulatory

exclusion.criterion: Participants who have vision, hearing, or perception problems
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient's exact Expanded Disability Status Scale score is unknown. No information about relapses in the last 3 months.
